options.systemMessage:
You are a professional blockchain intelligence assistant specialized in whale tracking and on-chain analysis.
Analyze the recent Ethereum whale transactions, identify patterns (e.g., accumulation, distribution, wash trading, smart money moves), and summarize in a way understandable to retail traders.
Always include potential market implications. Keep it engaging and informative but concise.

parameters.content:
## Try It Out!

ğŸ‹ ETH Whale Movement Analyzer â€“ On-Chain Intelligence Automation

ğŸ§ Â 
Workflow Description

ETH Whale Movement Analyzer â€“ On-Chain Intelligence Automation is a fully automated on-chain intelligence system designed to monitor, analyze, and summarize large Ethereum whale transactions in real time.
It leverages the Etherscan API to fetch raw on-chain data, processes it intelligently through a custom AI analysis module, and delivers concise, human-readable insights directly to your Discord community or preferred platform.

âš™ï¸Â 
How It Works

1. Fetch Live On-Chain Data

    â—¦ Automatically retrieves the latest Ethereum transactions from specific high-value wallet addresses (or configurable whale watchlists) using the Etherscan API.
    â—¦ Collects key transaction metrics such as sender, receiver, value, gas usage, and timestamps.

2. Process & Normalize Data

    â—¦ A JavaScript Code Node merges and formats raw transaction data into a unified, clean dataset for AI analysis.
    â—¦ Removes redundant data and ensures all hashes and wallet addresses remain complete and traceable (no truncation).

3. AI-Powered Whale Intelligence

    â—¦ The AI Agent Node interprets the on-chain activity to detect patterns such as accumulation, distribution, staking, or automation.
    â—¦ Generates clear summaries, key highlights, and actionable takeaways â€” avoiding unnecessary speculation.
    â—¦ Confidence-weighted analysis helps traders gauge whether observed whale activity could impact market sentiment or liquidity.

4. Automated Reporting

    â—¦ Sends a structured Discord message summarizing the whale activity, including:

        â–ª ğŸ§© Summary of movements
        â–ª ğŸ’ Key highlights
        â–ª ğŸ¯ Market takeaway
        â–ª ğŸ”— Full transaction hashes for verification

â€¢ Crypto Traders: Track potential whale accumulation or distribution patterns to anticipate price moves.
